DOC.brief_summary: This study compare change outcomes follow viscosupplementation knee osteoarthritis .
DOC.brief_title: Functional Quality Life Outcomes Following Viscosupplementation Knee Osteoarthritis
DOC.detailed_description: The specific aim study compare change knee pain symptom , physical function , gait parameter quality life person knee OA follow standard viscosupplementation injection series hyaluronic acid ( HA ) one year period .
DOC.criteria: 21 year age old osteoarthritis degeneration , degenerative joint disease degeneration fully cognizant study procedure willing carefully participate study process assessment less 21 year age allergic reactivity hyaluronic acid current knee infection , infection around injection site skin disease pregnancy lactation nonambulatory
